challenge.title: Introduction To Data Science - A Python Approach - Chapter 9
challenge.description: Laura Igual and Santi Segui's Introduction To Data Science - A Python Approach is an introduction to data science using Python (programming language).
challenge.instructions: Read Laura Igual's Introduction To Data Science - A Python Approach, Chapter Nine, on E-Reserve at Archive.org and follow along with coding exercises.
